summary: zlib bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The zlib packages provide a general-purpose lossless data compression
library that is used by many different programs.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* AlmaLinux8.2 - zlib on s390x may produce incomplete raw (but not gzip/zlib)
streams (BZ#1860952)

* AlmaLinux8.2 - raw zlib test failed with DFLTCC_LEVEL_MASK set to 0x1ff
(BZ#1862108)

* AlmaLinux8.2 - Fix support for IBM Z hardware-accelerated deflate (zlib)
(BZ#1867876)
